original_title: 愛MY タカラモノと話せるようになった女の子の話
overview: This entertaining film for young people, which will make you laugh and cry, is about a girl who suddenly one day isable to talk to things(the things = her possessions).  Oneday, suddenly, high school girl Mai is able to talk to things like her scrunchy and mechanical pencil.  Mai clashes with her best friend Yuko as she causes trouble, and they growup as a result.
title: What if you can talk to your Belongings?
